text: (piano music)

- I'm here in Leeds at
the Green Flag Head Office

and I'm delighted to be
joined by Jeremy Bristow.

Maybe we start with
the Green Flag mission.

- Put simply, we want to
make motoring stress-free,
safe, and simple for every driver,
so it's all about getting to the customer

as quickly as possible and
providing a reliable service.
- What's been getting in the way
of that ambition historically?

- So I think our biggest
blocker has been technology.

Five years ago, before we
started our transformation,
we were on a legacy IT infrastructure

that really got in the way
of us being able to satisfy
the increasing demands of our customers.

- So tell us then, how
did you get started?

How did you create this
kind of infrastructure
for innovation at scale?
- So it all started with our vision.

We wanted to become a FinTech
inside a larger business.
So we took the decision to work with AWS
and build a serverless cloud ecosystem

to be able to satisfy
and delight our customers
and provide a great customer experience.

- So you're talking about the
customers and interaction.

To interact, you need to
understand those customers,

so maybe tell us a little
bit about the data strategy
that underpins this.

- So we've always had
lots and lots of data.
The challenge has always been,
we've been data rich but insight poor.
Data was disparate around the organization
and none of it was connected,
so the first thing we wanted to do

was to use AWS services to
bring all of that data together

into one data platform so we
can then start to really drive

and understand what our
customers are telling us.
The other thing we want to do with data

was make it available
to our brilliant people.
They can start to affect the change.
- Tell us a little bit about
kinda the impact and the experience,
maybe from a partner perspective too.

- So our partners have
been really impressed.

The fact that we've been able
to deliver this transformation

which is a bit like
performing open heart surgery

whilst running a marathon
'cause our business is 24/7, 365
has been really pleasing for our partners.
- So, you've achieved some amazing things
over the last five years.
If you look to the future,

what are some of the big
kinda business challenges
that you're looking to focus on?

- We want to diversify
our products and services.
Amazon Connect is helping us do that.

It's helping us understand
why are customers calling
and what are the reasons for those calls.

Using the data that we
have to drive insights
start to use machine learning techniques

to make sure that we're
offering the best prices

for our customers so
they get brilliant value.
- Jeremy, amazing stuff.
Thank you so much for sharing the journey
that Green Flag has been on
and we look forward to seeing what's next.
- [Jeremy] Thank you.
(piano music)
